title: got banned and i dont know how
body: not sure why this account got banned and i didnt get a email {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: That email should have been sent to whichever email you have currently verified on the account, but if you aren't seeing it anywhere go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to go over everything with you there!
